renderString

private static void renderString(java.lang.String string,
                                 int textureObject,
                                 int gridSize,
                                 float x,
                                 float y,
                                 float characterWidth,
                                 float characterHeight)
Renders text using a font bitmap.

Parameters:
string - the string to render
textureObject - the texture object containing the font glyphs
gridSize - the dimensions of the bitmap grid (e.g. 16 -> 16x16 grid; 8 -> 8x8 grid)
x - the x-coordinate of the bottom-left corner of where the string starts rendering
y - the y-coordinate of the bottom-left corner of where the string starts rendering
characterWidth - the width of the character
characterHeight - the height of the character
